description: Surrogate unique identifier for this asset warranty record.
Identifier of the covered asset (vehicle/equipment); typically a foreign key to the asset master.
Reference to the category of coverage (e.g., manufacturer, extended, parts/labor); likely a lookup code; confirm with SME.
Identifier of the organization providing the coverage (manufacturer, dealer, or third‑party administrator).
Type of usage meter tied to coverage limits (miles, kilometers, engine hours); likely from a meter type list; confirm with SME.
Calendar date when coverage ends, regardless of usage unless superseded by meter limits.
Usage threshold at which coverage ends, based on the specified meter; very high values may represent ‘no limit’; confirm with SME.
Free-text notes about terms, exclusions, or special conditions of the coverage.
System timestamp of the most recent update to this record in the source application.
Timestamp of the most recent user-initiated change; likely similar to user_date_modified; confirm with SME.
Identifier of the user who created the record.
Timestamp when the record was created by a user.
Identifier of the user who last updated the record.
Timestamp of the last modification performed by a user.
